Package com.flag4j.linalg.decompositions

Class RealQRDecomposition

java.lang.Object
com.flag4j.linalg.decompositions.QRDecomposition<Matrix>
com.flag4j.linalg.decompositions.RealQRDecomposition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Decomposition<Matrix>
public final class RealQRDecomposition extends QRDecomposition<Matrix>
Computes the QR decomposition for a real matrix.

  • Constructor Details

    • RealQRDecomposition

      public RealQRDecomposition()
      Constructs a QR decomposer which computes the full QR decomposition.

    • RealQRDecomposition

      public RealQRDecomposition​(boolean fullQR)
      Constructs a QR decomposer which computes either the full or reduced QR decomposition.
      Parameters:
      fullQR - Flag for determining if the full QR decomposition should be used. If true, the full QR decomposition will be computed, if false, the reduced QR decomposition will be computed.

  • Method Details

    • decompose

      public void decompose​(Matrix src)
      Applies decomposition to the source matrix.
      Parameters:
      src - The source matrix to decompose. Not modified.

    • reduced

      private void reduced​(Matrix A)
      Computes the reduced QR decomposition on the src matrix.
      Parameters:
      A - The source matrix to decompose.

    • full

      private void full​(Matrix A)
      Computes the full QR decomposition on the src matrix.
      Parameters:
      A - The source matrix to decompose.

    • getHouseholder

      private Matrix getHouseholder​(Matrix col)
      Computes the Householder reflector for the specified column vector.
      Parameters:
      col - Column vector to compute Householder reflector for.
      Returns:
      The Householder transformation matrix.
